task.title: Managing contacts
task.shortdesc: The Contacts window displays your groups. When you expand the groups, the app shows the individuals in the groups.

taskbody.context: You can rename and remove groups and members in your contact list.

step.cmd: Click the menu icon ( ) in the navigator and select Contacts.
To remove a group or name from your contact list, click the menu icon next to the name and click Remove from Contacts List.
step.info: Click Remove to confirm the removal.

step.cmd: To rename a group or name, click the menu icon next to the name.

choices.choice: For a contact, click Edit Nickname.
For a group, click Rename Group.

step.info: In the text box, type the new name and click the check mark when finished. Click X to cancel and retain the current name.
